fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player. The next time their ability is processed, it will be the last one processed and all effects that have already taken place will have happened.
- (Rehearsing) Increase your priority by 2, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Deal a rampage attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, your attack will always be the final thing that is processed.
- **Rehearse Radius:** 5
